markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Uzunjati Recollection](/Feats.aspx?ID=1114) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Magaambyan Attendant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=29)

**Prerequisites**
[Uzunjati Storytelling](/Feats.aspx?ID=1109); master in a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) skill

</column>

---

You tell a story spontaneously from nearly forgotten facts, delving into your memory and entertaining your audience in the process. [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) with a skill in which you have master proficiency, then use Uzunjati Storytelling with the same skill. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your skill check for Uzunjati Storytelling from the added details.

<title level="2">Uzunjati Recollection leads to...</title>
[Janatimo's Lessons](/Feats.aspx?ID=2166)
name: Uzunjati Recollection
prerequisite: Uzunjati Storytelling; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
prerequisite_markdown: [Uzunjati Storytelling](/Feats.aspx?ID=1109); master in a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) skill
